This game has honestly sucked all life out of me and I genuinely am addicted lmaooo. Honestly though if your a fan of horror or slasher movies/books or any horror related content; this game is for you! I have put a decent amount of hours in (900) and from what I have gathered this far is that there's no true way to play this game. Bring those sweaty builds, bring the meta perks and also don't forget the amazing add-ons! At the end of the day if you play the game how you want; this is when you'll enjoy it the most. Many people will tell you things in end game chat, for example "Gen Rushing", "Tunneling", "Camping" but honestly none of these things really matter and I think they are bs. Don't give into the survivor or killer imaginary rulebook; but most importantly, make sure to say GG and spread some love <3 Hope you enjoy as much as I do.... Also Michael Myers is hot and you can't tell me otherwise

Many players don't actually understand the game. Killers goal isn't to kill the survivors and the survivors goal isn't to survive. The real goal is who can annoy the other side the most. 10/10 would recommend. Builds character.

Игра конечно подойдёт не всем. По своему опыту скажу, что не нужно ныть в первые 300 часов обучения, там вы осознаете все её тонкости. Почему я говорю что подойдёт не всем, да потому что те, кто хотят всего и сразу, не смогут прокачать всех персонажей до высокого уровня и пошлют дбд на..., а так игра прикольная. Главное не засиживаться в ней до такой степени, что вас начнёт от неё тошнить. И вам сразу надо определится, кто вы по жизни в этой игре, сурв или ман. У меня всё.

Dead By Daylight is a great game, especially with friends. It can be ruined by cheaters and people camping hooks, but overall the premise of the game is very simple and very fun. I highly recommend especially if you have friends to play it with.
Jogo muito bom, pode ser jogado com amigos q isso deixa a experiência ainda mais divertida :D

It seems like I enjoyed playing this for several hours at the beginning. I also managed to deal with control in a short time and had started feeling confident as for tactic and achieving basic goals. An atmospheric gameplay and locations can not remain you dissatisfied especially if you are into horrors. 
However after playing 20+ hours I felt it's becoming more and more annoying and boring. Every sessions passes in the same single script: search for a generator, microgame represented by simple reaction test, search for another generator, distract murderer a bit, hang on hook, AT THIS THE WHOLE POINT. As for killer it's not pretty exciting, just like switches to touch-and-run.
Further you can stumble upon a point after which you realize the game absolutely stopped bringing you positive emotions and it's time to leave. Exactly what i did.

When I first played the game, it had what I hoped for. Adrenaline pumping terror. I would highly recommend if that's something you are looking for. But lately this game has been filled with so much repetitive camping, tunneling, and NOED. It has the same perk set up for each killer. It has got to the point every match is either boring, annoying, or straight up toxic.
As a killer, you have more control over the way the game is played, but it can still be just as annoying, boring, repetitive. There almost nothing but hate from the survivors. If you kill them, you're an asshole. If you let them go, "You're trash, get rekt."
I want to have the same joy I did when I started out 2k hours ago, but I just don't see things getting any better. They are taking out interesting aspects of the game that I was looking forward to unlocking, and over all, I feel like the game is just falling apart. I hope I'm wrong, and if it does ever seem to get better other than an hour of decent matches, I will look forward to editing this review, but for now I'd say "try this game, get that adrenaline going, then hope that it gets better."

I have played this game for about a few years off and on purely because of one reason. 

The community is more toxic than arsenic and nuclear waste. I used to be able to deal with this days on end because I had a genuine passion for the game, the characters, and the community at the time. I stopped playing for about a year because of the in-game behavior from other players on both sides but I do play Killer most often. 

My first game back with a year of NO GAMES PLAYED, I get paired with a Survive With Friends at Red Ranks while I am Ash IV. I'd say this game brings up everything wrong with the game at the current moment. I manage to get a hit on a survivor, the sound of a hit registers but the survivor does not go down. I look away from a flashlight and at a wall to pick up a survivor and get stunned anyway. I swing through a pallet, get stunned by the survivor and still manage to get hit. This is more of the technical issues but I go onto the toxic part. 

Throughout that entire game I was getting nothing but T-Bags, Points, Flashlight Clicks. They even sat at the exit gate at the very last second to t-bag and keep me in that hell of a game for longer than I would've preferred. I'm not stranger to in-game toxicity, I've seen it all at this point but it's only gotten more and more prevalent as the years go on. I doesn't bother me as much as it used to but I suppose my skin has softened in the time that I haven't been playing or I just met my breaking point.

Most of the perks aren't even worth using anymore since they're extremely situational and the Meta Perks are overshadowing them. In the games that I've played, there's ALWAYS someone if not an entire team with Decisive Strike, Unbreakable, Borrowed Time, Dead Hard, or something to the extent of those. Having to always deal with those perks and experiencing nothing new just makes playing as a killer stale. 

I wouldn't advise playing this game until the Ranked System is either reverted or fixed, the games and bugs are less prevalent within games. I may return to this game for the addiction but not out of love for this game but because I have other people who still play and enjoy it.

Existem diversas análises nesta página que realçam os problemas do jogo, por isso tenciono fazer o mesmo. Passando o reclamanço habitual de como o jogo é mau por isto e aquilo, posso certamente afirmar que o produto em análise foi concebido por um clã de autistas após sofrerem graves ferimentos no cortex. Pela vossa sanidade mental, por favor, não caiam na tentação de comprar o que quer que seja relacionado com este autêntico aterro sanitário. Como suporte ao que foi escrito acima, e para quem ainda não ficou convencido que isto é apenas, como se diz na gíria, uma granda merda, fique informado o indivíduo que lê esta análise, que estes tubérculos com acesso a tecnologia de ponta tencionam em cumprir, a criação de um jogo em que é possível ter encontros românticos (e só Deus sabe mais o quê) com personagens fictícios do seu "jogo de sucesso"... Espero que isto seja esclarecedor e por favor, gaste o seu dinheiro sabiamente, pois eu já não tenho essa sorte.
